awd_abstract_narration: This proposal supports a project designed to improve the                        demonstration and laboratory course of the Introduction to                      Photonics course at a community college located near military and               industrial areas.  It is designed for technicians, and not for                  future scholars.  The proposer states "the project is significant               in that it is a model program of curricular design which can aid                the military and industry by supplying personnel who can design and             operate equipment in the emerging fields of photonics."  I concur               with his statement.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          //
